languages.text: {n}Идира, сутулясь и шмыгая носом, поспешно входит в кабинет. Вид у нее изможденный — под глазами мешки, волосы всклочены, а по рукам то и дело проходит мелкая дрожь. Она с трудом фокусирует взгляд на вас и выдает кривую улыбку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира, сутулясь и шмыгая носом, поспешно входит в кабинет. Вид у нее изможденный — под глазами мешки, волосы всклочены, а по рукам то и дело проходит мелкая дрожь. Она с трудом фокусирует взгляд на вас и выдает кривую приветственную улыбку.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bags under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Идира, сутулясь и шмыгая носом, поспешно входит в кабинет. Вид у нее изможденный — под глазами мешки, волосы всклочены, а по рукам то и дело проходит мелкая дрожь. Она с трудом фокусирует взгляд на вас и выдает кривую улыбку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bugs under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile in greeting.{/n}

{n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bugs under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile in greeting.{/n}

{n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bags under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile.{/n}

{n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bags under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile.{/n}

{n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bags under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉急匆匆地走近书房，吸着鼻子，缩着肩膀。她看起来很憔悴，眼睛下面挂着眼袋，头发蓬乱，双手每隔一会儿就会微微颤抖。她努力将目光集中在你身上，勉强露出了扭曲的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bags under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉急匆匆地走近书房，吸着鼻子，缩着肩膀。她看起来很憔悴，眼睛下面挂着眼袋，头发蓬乱，双手每隔一会儿就会微微颤抖。她努力将目光集中在你身上，勉强露出了扭曲的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira entra en el estudio a toda prisa, sollozando y con los hombros caídos. Tiene un aspecto demacrado: ves bolsas bajo sus ojos, lleva el pelo desaliñado y sus manos tiemblan cada pocos segundos. Con esfuerzo, centra su mirada en ti y se fuerza a esbozar una sonrisa torcida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bags under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira entra en el estudio a toda prisa, sollozando y con los hombros caídos. Tiene un aspecto demacrado: ves bolsas bajo sus ojos, lleva el pelo desaliñado y sus manos tiemblan cada pocos segundos. Con esfuerzo, centra su mirada en ti y se fuerza a esbozar una sonrisa torcida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira eilt ins Arbeitszimmer, schniefend und mit hängenden Schultern. Sie sieht ausgezehrt aus. Sie hat tiefe Augenringe, ihre Haare sind völlig zerzaust und ihre Hände zittern immer wieder leicht. Mit einiger Mühe fokussiert sie ihren Blick auf dich und zwingt sich zu einem schiefen Lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bags under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira eilt ins Arbeitszimmer, schniefend und mit hängenden Schultern. Sie sieht ausgezehrt aus. Sie hat tiefe Augenringe, ihre Haare sind völlig zerzaust und ihre Hände zittern immer wieder leicht. Mit einiger Mühe fokussiert sie ihren Blick auf dich und zwingt sich zu einem schiefen Lächeln.{/n}

languages.text: {n}イディラは鼻をすすり、肩をすぼめながら急ぐように研究室に入っていく。その表情には憔悴が見えた。目の下にはくまがあり、髪は乱れ、手は小刻みに震えている。しかし彼女はどうにかあなたに目を向け、引きつった笑みを浮かべてみせた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bags under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは鼻をすすり、肩をすぼめながら急ぐように研究室に入っていく。その表情には憔悴が見えた。目の下にはくまがあり、髪は乱れ、手は小刻みに震えている。しかし彼女はどうにかあなたに目を向け、引きつった笑みを浮かべてみせた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une Idira semblant porter tout le malheur du monde sur ses épaules entre précipitamment dans le bureau en reniflant. Elle a l'air hagarde. Ses yeux sont cernés, ses cheveux sont en bataille et ses mains sont régulièrement prises de légers tremblements. Non sans effort, elle parvient à fixer son regard sur vous et se force à sourire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bags under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une Idira semblant porter tout le malheur du monde sur ses épaules entre précipitamment dans le bureau en reniflant. Elle a l'air hagarde. Ses yeux sont cernés, ses cheveux sont en bataille et ses mains sont régulièrement prises de légers tremblements. Non sans effort, elle parvient à fixer son regard sur vous et se force à sourire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dünyanın yükün omuzlarında taşıyormuş gibi duran İdira, burnunu çeker hâlde aceleyle çalışma odasına dalıyor. Bitkin gözüküyor. Göz altlarındaki torbalar belirginleşmiş, saçları birbirine girmiş, elleri de arada bir hafifçe titriyor. Biraz çabayla gözlerini sana çevirip çarpık bir gülümseme takınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira hurriedly enters the study, sniffling and hunching her shoulders. She looks haggard — there are bags under her eyes, her hair is dishevelled, and her hands quiver slightly every few moments. With some effort, she focuses her eyes on you and forces a crooked smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, burnunu çekerek ve omuzlarını kaldırmış bir şekilde çalışma odasına aceleyle dalıyor. Bitkin gözüküyor. Göz altlarındaki torbalar belirginleşmiş, saçları karman çorman olmuş ve elleri arada bir hafifçe titriyor. Biraz çabalayarak gözlerini sana çeviriyor ve çarpık bir gülümseme takınıyor.{/n}
